name: Principled refusal + alternatives
summary: Refuse a request based on a principle/constraint and immediately offer acceptable alternatives.
goal: Maintain firmness without escalation and keep negotiation moving.
counterparty_guidance: Evaluate whether their alternatives meet your core needs.
Propose your own alternatives if theirs are weak.
Clarify trade-offs rather than accepting a false choice.
Avoid being boxed into a narrow set of options.

ui.card_summary: Refuse a request based on a principle/constraint and immediately offer acceptable alternatives.
